scripts.dev: pnpm obelisk hello && pnpm run localnode && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network localnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && tail -f localnode.nohup.out
scripts.dev:docker: pnpm obelisk hello && pnpm run localnode:docker && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network localnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && tail -f localnode.nohup.out
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network localnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network devnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network testnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network mainnet --configPath ./assets/Scripts/obelisk.config.ts && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
